validShot(int[], GamePlayers) - Method in class model.GamePlayers
This method will be used in order to decide whether a shot is valid or not, no matter by whom the shot is made.

W

welcomingInstructions(Scanner) - Static method in class model.Game
This method is used for the welcoming instructions shown to the user.
whichDirectionToPutShip(Scanner) - Method in class model.Player
Method that after having placed the ships, asks for the user to specify the direction of the ship.
whichDirectionToPutShipForSecondPlayer(Scanner) - Method in class model.Player
Method that asks the user in which direction shall the ship point to.
wonTheGame() - Method in class model.Player
Method tha signifies that the player has won the game.
wonTheGameAI() - Method in class model.Ai
Method signifying that the AI has won the game.
